name: Tornadus
description: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one stage.
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.effect: When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages.  If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
